name: @fylgja/button
description: The Button component serves as an interactive element. To call your users to an action
author: Fylgja

scripts.build:layer: npx sass layer.scss layer.css --no-source-map -s compressed -I node_modules
scripts.build:main: npx sass button.scss button.css --no-source-map -s compressed -I node_modules
scripts.build: npm run build:layer && npm run build:main
